name: getReportProfitAndLoss
description: Retrieves report for profit and loss

fromDate.description: The from date for the ProfitAndLoss report e.g. 2018-03-31

toDate.description: The to date for the ProfitAndLoss report e.g. 2018-03-31

periods.description: The number of periods to compare (integer between 1 and 12)

timeframe.description: The period size to compare to (MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR)

trackingCategoryID.description: The trackingCategory 1 for the ProfitAndLoss report

trackingCategoryID2.description: The trackingCategory 2 for the ProfitAndLoss report

trackingOptionID.description: The tracking option 1 for the ProfitAndLoss report

trackingOptionID2.description: The tracking option 2 for the ProfitAndLoss report

standardLayout.description: Return the standard layout for the ProfitAndLoss report

paymentsOnly.description: Return cash only basis for the ProfitAndLoss report
